products.title: Vitra Blackout Zorro Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Vitra blackout is one of their most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. Revamp your home or office space with a stunning vitra blackout zorro roller blind in a beautiful brown colour. The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach. Product id: db-erbx1099 fabric colour: zorro material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes vitra blackout zorro electric roller blind in brown.
